message: No, Mr Obama, 'black folks' are more likely to be killed by other 'black folks'. All you have to do is check the statistics of gang filled inner cities all over this country. message: Very shortsighted article. User experience sells devices, not specs. Blackberry was dying because they refused to let go of their dated OS, now they have adopted a better one with Google. It will be a slow come back though. People were writing the same nonsense about the Microsoft Surface three years ago. So Microsoft turfed RT and switched to Windows 10. Now that hybrid device is not only dominating, but has caused a shift in design over the rest of the tablet/laptop market.

message: Have you seen the """"charitable"""" donations the foundation made? Like the millions dollar sports arenas in struggling """"communities"""" that don't even have running water....
